mapper.select: select rno, pnum, text, id, cast(wdate as char) as wdate from spring_replist where pnum = #{pnum} limit #{cri.pageStart}, #{cri.perPageNum}
mapper.insert: insert into spring_replist (pnum, text, id) values (#{pnum}, #{text}, #{id})
mapper.update: update spring_replist set text= #{text} where rno = #{rno}
mapper.select: select count(*) from spring_replist where pnum = #{pnum}
